page.title: 04A Day In The Life Of Myself
page.content: I get up at 8 o'clock in the morning - get dressed, do my hair and go down for breakfast. My friend comes up for me at 8:40 and we walk to school together. We get inside and settle down. Mr Coull asks us about the news. Then we do maths until playtime. At 10:45 we come in again and then do English or something like that until dinner time. At 12:40 I go home for my dinner and then leave the house at about 1:45. At 2:00 the bell rings and we go in. Sometimes we do art in the afternoon until 2:45. At 3:00 we usually write a story until home-time at 3:45. I go to the park or I stay in. I go to bed about 10:00.
